basic.description:
A critical evaluation of the changing relationships between nature and society.
LEARNING HOURS    127 (36L;4G;12O;3Oc;72P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Environments and Society

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITES    (6.0 units from GPHY 227/3.0; GPHY 228/3.0; GPHY 229/3.0) or (3.0 units at the 200 level or above in DEVS).
